title: Love in the Time of Murder
description: In Love in the Time of Murder, the Gray-Haired Knitting Detectives face their toughest case yet.Dee is finally – finally! – free of her jerk of a husband. She's living in a new town, has a new job, and will soon move into a new apartment.But then her jerk of a husband has to go and ruin things by getting himself murdered. If that's not bad enough, the police are pointing the finger at her. As if.The Gray-Haired Knitting Detectives aren't about to let one of their own get sent to the slammer and jump at the chance to search for the true killer.As if Dee doesn't have enough problems, the so-called detectives decide her being a widow is the perfect opportunity to find her a new man. Time to put their matchmaking 'skills' to use. Oh boy.
author: Elaine Spaan
